title: Request : Examples of FF Sanuk in use
content:
Hello,

As the logo is set in FF Sanuk, I thought at first it could be nice to use it also for headings and subheadings.  
I must admit I’m not so happy with my first attempts. But I think it’s because I don’t know how to set it properly, yet.

Could someone please be nice enough to point me to some nice example of Sanuk in use ?

 [‹ stationery / letterheads books ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42835 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old-style Figures ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163022/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45506 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john good

comments.content:
Sanuk has been used for TYPO Berlin 2007 and also for TypeCon 2007.  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/698933584/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163022/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/698933584/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/698933584/")

Well,  
thanks Florian, but there, Sanuk is used for identities...  
I’d like to see FF Sanuk used for everything else !

+
